arts.ttl: Crawley claim overdue away win by beating Charlton
arts.sum: Max Anderson bagged the winner with 10 minutes left.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic v Crawley Town line-ups: Two changes for Addicks as Miles Leaburn starts
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic manager Nathan Jones has made two changes for this evening’s League One match against Crawley Town. Subs: Reid, Jones, T Campbell, Edun, Small, Kanu, Laqueretabua.

arts.ttl: FA Cup third round draw LIVE: Updates as Liverpool, Manchester United and Premier League sides learn fate
arts.sum: A total of 64 sides will found out their opponents for the next round, with all Championship and Premier League sides entering the draw

arts.sum: Charlton Athletic are in for an important January window and centre-back Lloyd Jones is claimed to be attracting… The post 3 centre-backs Charlton Athletic must eye as League One rivals target key player appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: ‘He knew the game and had a great gift for story-telling’ - A tribute to Charlton Athletic reporting stalwart Kevin Nolan
arts.sum: The Mercury of the late 1980s needed to publish an interesting First Division match report five days after a game which had already been extensively covered in the national press. The Mercury was always much more than an interested bystander in these turbulent years, with the Valley abandoned and the club staging home games at Crystal Palace’s Selhurst Park.
